name: St. Ives Oatmeal Scrub
description: One part scrub, one part mask. Walnut shell powder gently buffs away dull skin when used as a face scrub. The calming properties of oatmeal inspired the craft of a scrub that can also be used as a face mask. Voilà, a 2-in-1 treat for your skin!*Images for illustration purposes only. Product recieved may vary.
